name: F.O.U.R. (NeverDrop Games)
description:
Foo, Ozmo, Ubi and Ren, four astronauts sent to explore distant and new worlds, have crashed on an alien planet.

On this apparently desert world the most dangerous threats are loneliness and fear. Tricked by their own minds, our brave astronauts might even die. 

They have to find each other and repair their shuttle if they want to escape, but something ancient is trying to keep them stuck on the planet...

Control all of the four astronauts, gather resources and craft technological tools to help them survive.

-Four unique characters with special abilities

-Stress system:  survive the tension put on you by the dangers of the planet

-Procedural map: every time you play, the planet will be different

-A mystery to solve: discover the truth about the entity that's  keeping the whole planet in its grasp.

The game is still in prototype phase and needs a lot of balancing. If you want to help us leave your feedback in the comments, it will be very appreciated:)
